contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Object representing a contact reference for the sample

external_reference.title: BioSamples external reference
external_reference.description: Object representing a link to a repository or page associated with the sample itself, e.g. a link to an ENA record

organisation.title: Organisation
organisation.description: Object representing an organization related to the sample in some way

publication.title: Publication
publication.description: Object representing a publication associated to the sample

relationship.title: BioSamples relationship
relationship.description: Relationship object connecting two BioSamples accessions

source.description: The sample accession where the relation starts from

target.description: The sample accession where the relation targets to

structured_data.title: BioSamples structured data item
structured_data.description: A structured data item, e.g. an antibiogram table

type.description: The type of structured data this item is

schema.description: The URL reference to the schema

name.description: The sample name, or an alias, or another id

release.description: Sample relase date-time in ISO8601 format. Release date in the future means the sample is private

update.description: Sample last update date-time in ISO8601 format. This is automatically set from the server on submission

characteristics.description: All the characteristics associated to the sample

relationships.description: Sample relationships with other samples in BioSamples

externalReferences.description: Array of references to external resources

organization.description: Organization information associated with the sample

contact.description: Contact information of the people associated with the sample

data.description: Contains the structured data associated with a sample

text.description: The attribute value expressed as text

ontologyTerms.description: An array of ontology iri associated to the attribute value

unit.description: The unit associated with the attribute value
